stepAnswer: data, which contains values that PivotTable will summarize, and category, which describes the data by categorizing it
stepTitle: What are the two fields of PivotTables?
choices: data, which contains values that PivotTable will summarize, and category, which describes the data by categorizing it
category, which contains values that PivotTable will summarize, and data, which describes the data by categorizing it
data, which contains objects, and categories, which contains characters
data, which contains special characters and numeric, and categories, which contains characters
